meanings.definition: A person who meddles in the affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: The busybody from next door always knows everyone's business.
meanings.sent2: The busybody couldn't resist poking around in her neighbor's personal matters.
meanings.sent3: The busybody accidentally mixed up the neighbors' mail, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She was like a busybody bee buzzing from one gossip to another.
meanings.sent5: The busybody's nosiness was as noticeable as a bright neon sign.

meanings.definition: To interfere in the affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: Please don't busybody in my work; I can handle it myself.
meanings.sent2: She tends to busybody in everyone's business, thinking she knows best.
meanings.sent3: He decided to busybody in the meeting, offering unsolicited advice.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity made her want to busybody into the mysterious situation.
meanings.sent5: The cat busybodies around the house, always getting into things it shouldn't.
